name: Orc Warlord
movement: 30 feet with average speed on the battlefield.
description: The Orc Warlord is a strong and commanding medium humanoid clad in half plate armor, perfect for leading troops in melee combat and displaying exceptional martial prowess.
memorable: Its ability to increase damage output and rally allies makes it a deadly force in battle.
goals: To lead its allies to victory through melee combat and tactical positioning.
relations: Typically found among other orcish warriors, commanding a group of allies in battle.
environment: Commonly found in orc strongholds or in battlefields where orc tribes gather.
strengths: High damage output with weapon attacks and provides tactical advantages to allies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to ranged attacks due to average Dexterity.
attacks: Utilizes both a longsword and a skull club for powerful melee attacks, capable of making multiple strikes in one turn.
most_powerful_ability: Warlord's Rally, which grants allies advantage on their attack rolls.
equipment: Equipped with a longsword and a skull club, along with half plate armor.
senses: Perception score of 13, indicating a keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Limited Intelligence results in poor knowledge abilities, but average Wisdom adds slight advantages in perception.
additional_information: Has the ability to make multiattacks, increasing its offensive capabilities.
The Martial Adept ability enhances its weapon damage dramatically.
Possesses a strong Constitution, contributing to its durability in combat.
Can strategically reposition or gain advantages through Warrior’s Advance.
Leads orc troops with authority and strength.
